attributes.action: make Matthew John Davies Free Style dance whenever I say so.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whenever I ask my friend Matthew Davies to do some free style dancing he always refuses. I would like a law to be passed so that whenever I ask him to do it has no choice but to do so. If he doesn't he should go to prison forever.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
